collapsible.description: Whether an accordion item can be closed after it has been expanded.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the accordion when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the accordion.

disabled.description: Whether the accordion items are disabled

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the accordion. Useful for composition.

multiple.description: Whether multple accordion items can be expanded at the same time.

onFocusChange.description: The callback fired when the focused accordion item changes.

onValueChange.description: The callback fired when the state of expanded/collapsed accordion items changes.

orientation.description: The orientation of the accordion items.

value.description: The `value` of the accordion items that are currently being expanded.
